answers.answer: Difficult to say without evaluation.Seeing a dermatologist can be done to see if this is an abnormal skin lesion.It also seems that the healing process is slowed for some reason.  Diseases like diabetes and vascular disease can also impede the healing process.If the affected skin is exposed to the diarrhea, this can worsen the condition.  Discussing whether a dressing or barrier to the damage skin would help should be discussed.Followup with your personal physician is essential.This answer is not intended as and does not substitute for medical advice - the information presented is for patient education only.
